text:
🌱 Ecological Economist | 🤓 Data & Mapping Nerd



Hawai’i Sea Grant Fellow | PI-CASC Graduate Scholar
PhD Candidate in the Department of Natural Resources and Environmental Management (NREM) at University of Hawai’i (Manoa). Working on Natural Capital Accounting (NCA) and ecosystem valuation projects in the State of Hawai’i.
Principal Investigator: Dr Kirsten Oleson.

title: Louis Chua
text: I do a whole host of things besides research. These days its writing 📚, cooking 🍲, rugby 🏉, running 🏃‍♂️, water sports 🌊, and photography 📷
